entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 8:24 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:24 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 30%
